titles.title: Landfill Reduction Act of 2000
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the aggregate cost of certain reusable pallets and containers and related property which may be expensed under section 179.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/20/2000--Introduced. Landfill Reduction Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require the aggregate cost taken into account for purposes of allowing a deduction of costs pertaining to section 179 (relating to expensing depreciable business assets) property to be at least equal to the lesser of: (1) $500,000; or (2) the cost of such property which is qualified reusable pallet and container property placed in service during the taxable year.Makes this Act inapplicable to any taxable year beginning after December 31, 2008.
